She slowly turned her head towards the foolish maximal guard out of 
the cell of the small backwater spaceport. He would die. Soon.

They had left her guarded by only one guard because her ID were not 
valid. Had they really known who she was, they would have placed her 
under martial guard. And that is only because Maximals do not have 
death sentence.

???: Huh... Sir, there's something I gotta tell you...

He didn't turn right away. She had bothered him for the last hour with 
unimportant details. She took profit of the time to play her first 
card. Her arms became covered with blood red liquid for an instant, 
but she left them in her back.

Guard: What is it again, girl?

As a matter of fact, she didn't seem to be more than a young girl. 
Appearances, he would learn, were deceptive.

She took grab of his arms with her own, although hers were now thin, 
strong and long. Before he could scream, she kissed him passionately. 
That was the last kiss he got, though, as a liquid chainsaw ripped him 
in halves, destroying his spark.

???: There. I'm a Pred.

She left the small jail, taking the appearance of some ship pilot, and 
took a small and fast racing corvette. She left Cybertron quietly, 
aware that in a few hours, she'd be one of the planet's most wanted. 
It wouldn't matter.

???: I'm coming, you space-junkies, so you better freak now...
